explains: v. 表演；履行（perform 的现在分词）

sentences.en: She gets an obvious thrill out of performing.
sentences.cn: 她显然从表演中得到一种兴奋感。

sentences.en: I probably won't be performing in public much.
sentences.cn: 我很可能不会再经常当众演出。

sentences.en: She's much happier performing live than in a recording studio.
sentences.cn: 她现场表演比在录音棚里更开心。
